title: Habitto-Mobile-Docs.pdf
content:
Habitto Mobile – Product & Engineering
Purpose
End-to-end documentation for product flows, architecture, and QA across Authentication, Onboarding, Chat,
Session Booking, Support, Referral, Money Transfer, Investment, Insurance, and Money Habits (Manabu).
Table of Contents
Authentication
Onboarding
Chat (Twilio)
Session Booking
Support
Referral
Money Transfer
Investment
Insurance
Money Habits (Manabu)
App Architecture
Analytics & Events
Permissions & Privacy
Notifications & Deep Links
Release Process & QA
Conventions
File paths in backticks (e.g., src/screens/...)
Events snake_case by domain (e.g., auth_biometric_success)
Use InteractionManager.runAfterInteractions to defer heavy work
Authentication
Overview
Secure access; foreground lock; biometrics; lifecycle management.
Architecture
Hooks: src/screens/Auth/AppLock/useForegroundApplockHook.tsx
Biometrics UI: src/screens/Common/Biometrics.tsx
Actions: common/actions/appLock.actions.ts, common/actions/common.actions.ts,
common/actions/auth.actions.ts
Reducers: common/reducers/appState.reducer.ts, common/reducers/auth.reducer.ts
Selectors: common/selectors/appLockSelector.selector.tsx,
common/selectors/authSelectors.selector.tsx
Utilities: common/lib/DateHandler.ts, common/lib/utils.ts (delay, runInBackground)
Screens
Biometric prompt (native) and App Lock gate
Error states: unavailable sensor, opt-out
Flows
First-time biometric:
Detect device → prompt → store preference → continue.
Resume from background:
If lastActive ≥ 1h and user authenticated: lock → biometric prompt → resume.
Else: resume silently and run updates (ACTIONS.CHECK_UPDATES_N_RESUME_APP).
Fallback: if biometric disabled/unavailable → passcode or bypass per policy.
Lifecycle & State
Foreground hook:
On Active: setFromBackground(true) → setForegroundCheckStatus(true) →
biometric if needed → setForegroundCheckStatus(false) → resume tasks.
On Background: SET_LAST_ACTIVE_TIME_STAMP, setFromBackground(false).
Edge Cases
Notification deep-link while locked → defer until unlocked.
Rapid background/foreground flaps → deduplicate prompts.
ANR mitigation: defer heavy work using InteractionManager.
Analytics
auth_biometric_prompt_shown, auth_biometric_success, auth_biometric_failure, auth_lock_shown,
auth_resume_completed
QA
Devices with FaceID/TouchID/None
Resume at <1h and ≥1h
Deep-links while locked
Airplane-mode resume
Onboarding
Overview
Permissions, KYC/GMO consent, initial feature gating, tooltips.
Architecture
Screen: src/screens/Dashboard/Home/Home.screen.tsx
Actions: support.actions.ts (e.g., getAccountOpeningStatus,
getGMOconsentAgreement), common.actions.ts
Selectors: accountOpeningStatusSelector, localeSelector
Modals: components/PermissionRequestModal.component.tsx
Deep-links: root handlers in AppNavigation.tsx
Steps
Permissions: notifications (and iOS ATT)
Account opening:
FORM_NOT_SUBMITTED → start application
PROBLEM_IN_DATA → re-apply
WITHDRAWN/REJECTED → alternate CTAs
ACCOUNT_ACTIVATED & funded → dashboard
Consent: open URL, return via deep link.
Initial setting card if activated but not funded.
Tooltips sequence (savings → insurance → investment → more).
Deep Links
Weekly yield modal
Consent refresh link (refresh helpers → clear deep link)
Edge Cases
Foreground checks can block initial deep-link handling; defer.
Avoid duplicate API races; debounce where needed.
Analytics
onboarding_permission_prompt_shown/accepted
onboarding_kyc_status_updated
onboarding_initial_setting_action
QA
iOS/Android first-run permutations
KYC return flows
Permission toggles mid-flow
Chat (Twilio)
Overview
Real-time messaging with text/media; typing; read index; push deep-links.
Architecture
Events: src/navigation/AppRoutes.tsx (listeners, deferrals)
UI: react-native-chat-ui/src/components/*
State: messages, typing, last read index
Models
Message: sid, author, body, timestamp, type (text/image/video/audio/file), attributes, status
(sending/sent/failed)
Typing: author → boolean
Read index: per thread
Events
onMessagesLoad(messages):
Defer heavy init; set message list; set read index
messageAdded(message):
Toggle typing false; increment read index; for media, resolve temp URLs; dispatch updates
messageUpdated/Removed:
Update local store accordingly
Input (Android specifics)
Height 40–100 using onContentSizeChange
textAlignVertical: 'top'; scrollEnabled when keyboard visible
Hide attachment/AI row when keyboard visible; animate height/opacity
When keyboard hidden, show truncated overlay (ellipsizeMode="head") with the inputʼs text hidden
(transparent color) to avoid value mutation issues.
Performance
InteractionManager.runAfterInteractions for heavy events
Debounced dispatches; clean up listeners
Lazy load with React.Suspense and fallback
Analytics
chat_thread_opened/closed
chat_message_sent/received
chat_media_sent_{type}
chat_typing_started/stopped
chat_push_deeplink_opened
QA
High-volume inbound messages
All attachment types
Push deep-link → thread while app locked/unlocked
Android keyboard: growth/shrink and accessory row behavior
Session Booking
Overview
Book/reschedule advisor sessions; history with status tabs.
Architecture
Picker: CreateSession/SessionPicker.screen.tsx
History: SessionHistory.screen.tsx
Utilities: common/lib/utils.ts (date format)
Hooks: availability/time slots loading
Picker Flow
Load month availability on mount/month change
Day press → fetch daily slots (debounced; no duplicates)
Toggle shared vs assigned:
Preserve selectedDate
If day has no slots, fallback to previously valid date
History Flow
Tabs: All/Reserved/Completed/Canceled
Filter with memoized list
On focus: reset active tab to All (undefined)
Empty states:
All empty → show renderPreSessionBtn()
Others empty → “ するセッションはありません ”
RefreshControl.refreshing ← loading
Edge Cases
Remove useEffect calling onDayPress causing duplicate calls
Separate initial load effect from toggle-marking effect
Avoid circular deps resetting selected date
Analytics
session_month_availability_viewed
session_day_slots_viewed
session_booked, session_rescheduled, session_canceled
session_history_tab_selected
QA
Toggle repeatedly (selected date preserved)
No-slot fallback correctness
History empty-state behaviors
Refresh/Loading linkage
Support
Overview
Contact channels, FAQs, prompts, tooltips orchestrations.
Architecture
Actions: getSupportData, sendConversationMessages
Selectors: worker online, active tooltips, FAQs, overlay flags
Flows: initialize conversation post-profiling; run tooltips in order; resume app triggers re-checks
Analytics
support_tooltip_viewed_{name}
support_faq_loaded
support_conversation_resumed
QA
Tooltip order gating and user interaction persistence
Conversation resumes after background resume
Referral
Overview
Campaigns, share flows, and conversions.
Architecture
Campaign conditions computed in state/effects
Toast abstraction: common/lib/toast.ts → showToast
Flows
Create referral link (with conditions)
Share via native sheet
Parse conditions and track conversions
Edge Cases
Avoid store access in useMemo (move to useEffect or stabilize dependencies)
Replace ToastAndroid with showToast
Analytics
referral_share_initiated
referral_link_copied
referral_conversion
QA
iOS/Android share consistency
Campaign rule enforcement
Money Transfer
Overview
Entry → validation → review → confirm → status.
Validation
Amount boundaries; available balance; allowed recipients; compliance
Errors
Network backoff; compliance messaging; queued/pending states
Analytics
transfer_initiated, transfer_review_confirmed, transfer_success, transfer_failed,
transfer_limit_exceeded
QA
Boundary testing
Mid-flow background/foreground
Offline retry
Investment
Overview
Home cards, interest modal, investment navigation.
Architecture
Home: CardCarousel + chips in Home.screen.tsx
Actions: getInvestmentDetails
Mapping: GMO_SERVER_ERRORS for maintenance
Analytics
investment_card_viewed
interest_modal_opened/closed
investment_chip_clicked
QA
Maintenance mapping
Learn paths for closed accounts
Performance
Insurance
Overview
Policies lifecycle and re-apply flows.
Screens
Insurance card/CTA
Canceled/rejected guidance
Analytics
insurance_policy_viewed
insurance_cta_clicked
insurance_reapply_started
QA
Status transitions
Alert correctness
Money Habits (Manabu)
Overview
Content ingestion (Dato CMS), tagging, monthly report alerts.
Architecture
Queries: dev/prod CMS
Selectors: content, tags (interest/category/format), milestones
Actions: store content, show monthly reports
Analytics
manabu_content_loaded
manabu_filters_applied
manabu_report_shown
QA
Filtering accuracy
Report eligibility logic
Deep-link routing to alert screen
App Architecture
Navigation
Root container: AppNavigation.tsx (lazy-load via React.Suspense)
Stacks & listeners: AppRoutes.tsx
Heavy-event deferral via InteractionManager
State & Side Effects
Redux modules per domain
Local hooks for UI-only state
Debounce and memoization to reduce re-renders
Network
GraphQL hooks for CMS
Android background timers via helpers in utils
Analytics & Events
Naming Conventions
{domain}{action}{outcome} e.g., session_booked_success
Dimensions: platform, app_version, user_id (if allowed), locale
Sources
Adjust init/config
OneSignal handlers
Custom trackers: common/lib/dataTrackers.ts
QA
Validate payloads in sandbox
Volume sanity during high-frequency events
Permissions & Privacy
Permissions
Notifications: prompt + OneSignal subscription check
iOS ATT prompt on suitable moment in onboarding
Resume checks in foreground hook
Privacy
Minimize PII in events
Respect user settings and gating
Secure storage for secrets
Notifications & Deep Links
OneSignal
foregroundWillDisplay: intercept and optionally customize
click: parse launchURL, dispatch to navigation (defer until foreground checks)
Deep Links
Routes: Home, Consent Refresh, Interest Modal, Chat Thread
Deferral: wait until auth lock resolved
QA
Route matrix coverage
Locked/unlocked entry paths
Release Process & QA
CodePush/Updates
Runtime check: ACTIONS.CHECK_UPDATES_N_RESUME_APP
Avoid blocking UI on resume; defer heavy handlers
QA Suites
Per-domain checklists (this doc)
Performance: monitor ANRs and long main-thread tasks
